page.title: 11TOURIST ACCOMODATION FORRES
page.content: Forres offers a wide variety of accomodation for tourists.In the town itself there are nine hotels and many guest houses.Several self catering cottages are around Forres. The Royal lounge bar displays a collection of crests of RAF squadrons donated by airmen from nearby Kinloss. Large hotels eg The Royal offer many Facilities eg colour television and lounge bar .They are quite expensive though, charging between Â£17 and Â£20 per person per night.The guest houses are cheaper (Â£7 to Â£10) per night but offer only basic services ie bed and breakfast.Self catering cottages and chalets are fully equipped but guests must do their own shopping and cooking. The advantage of renting a cottage is that guests are free to go away on day trips without being tied to meal times.
